name: RIS_REVISE_RSLTS
description: This table provides an audit trail of dates, times, and user IDs of revisions to finalized study results through the Revise Results activity.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the order record associated with this procedure order.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: REVISING_USER_ID
columns.description: The user ID who revised the finalized result.

columns.name: REVISING_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: REVISED_DATETIME
columns.description: The date and time that the finalized result was revised.  If the date is null, the default value is 01/01/1900; If the time is null, the default value is 00:00.
